mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (bno, reply, replyer) values(#{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
insert into tbl_r_reply(rno, r_reply, r_replyer) values(#{rno}, #{r_reply}, #{r_replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set exist = 1 where rno = #{no}
update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate() where rno = #{rno}
update tbl_r_reply set r_reply = #{reply}, r_updatedate = sysdate() where r_rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno}
